TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapRpcServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapRpcServiceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SoapRpcServiceAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Sets the default format of SOAP requests and responses sent to and from XML Web service methods within the XML Web service.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcServiceAttribute> allows you to set the default encoding style for XML Web service methods within an XML Web service to `RPC` method encoding and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Encoded> parameter encoding.
Web Services Description Language (WSDL) defines two styles for how an XML Web service method, or operation, can be encoded in a SOAP request or a SOAP response: `RPC` and `Document`. The `RPC` style refers to encoding the XML Web service method according to section 7 of the SOAP specification for using SOAP for RPC. This style specifies that all parameters are encapsulated within a single element named after the XML Web service method, and that each element within that element represents a parameter named after its respective parameter name.
To set the default method level encoding to `Document`, apply a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentServiceAttribute> to the class implementing the XML Web service.
For more details, see [Customizing SOAP Message Formatting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/dkwy2d72(v=vs.100)).
This attribute can be applied to a class implementing an XML Web service.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcServiceAttribute> class.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets how SOAP messages are routed to the XML Web service.
Docs.value: A that represents how SOAP messages are routed to the XML Web service. The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse Use { System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::SoapBindingUse value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the binding used when invoking the Web service's methods.
Docs.value: A member of the enumeration specifying the binding used when invoking the Web service's methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value of this property is <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse.Default>.
